title: Meta takes aim at Twitter with the launch of rival app Threads
description: Meta unveiled an app to rival Twitter on Thursday

title: Police in South Africa say at least 16 people, including three children, have died in a gas leak near Johannesburg
description: Police in South Africa say at least 16 people, including three children, have died in a gas leak near Johannesburg

title: 'Incendiary devices' used in fire at Atlanta PD training facility
description: Atlanta officials are searching for suspects who they said set off incendiary devices at the current police training facility over the weekend.

title: Exonerated 'Central Park Five' member wins NYC Council race
description: A member of the “Central Park Five” has won the Democratic primary for a seat on the New York City Council representing Central Harlem

title: Man pleads guilty to raping girl in case that drew national attention for abortion
description: An Ohio man pleaded guilty to raping a then-9-year-old girl who sought an out-of-state abortion in what became a flashpoint in the national abortion rights debate.

title: JetBlue dumping partnership with American Airlines to salvage its purchase of Spirit
description: JetBlue is picking Spirt Airlines over American

title: WATCH:  Dad surprises daughter by rapping at wedding
description: The bride, Megan Washburn, said this was not the first time her dad, Wes Boldt, wrote his own rap.

title: CDC says 1 in 4 Americans hadn’t had COVID by end of 2022
description: New CDC estimates suggest that about 1 in 4 Americans did not have COVID-19 antibodies from previous infection by the end of 2022.

title: Vermont schools sue Monsanto over toxic PCB contamination
description: Dozens of Vermont school districts have sued chemical giant Monsanto over contamination in school buildings from now-banned toxic chemicals known as PCBs

title: Suspect in fatal shooting of Georgia sheriff's deputy arrested
description: Authorities say a sheriff’s deputy in Georgia has been shot and killed and the suspect tried to flee in the deputy’s patrol car

title: Earth reached the hottest temperature ever recorded on the 4th of July
description: The planet reached the highest temperature ever recorded by human-made instruments during one of America's most quintessential summer holidays.

title: Biden's Plan B on student loan forgiveness uses Higher Education Act: What to know
description: Joe Biden is launching a new effort with the Higher Education Act to forgive at least some student loan debt after the Supreme Court ruling against him

title: Official: Bus plunges into a gulch in Mexico, leaving as many as 27 people dead
description: A passenger bus lost control and veered off a road and into a 75-foot-deep (25 meter-deep) gully in southern Mexico, killing as many as 27 passengers

title: Wisconsin probes how 8 roller-coaster riders became trapped upside down for hours
description: State officials are investigating how eight people became trapped upside down on a roller coaster at a festival in Wisconsin

title: WATCH:  Spider crabs crawl on marine biologist
description: A marine biologist on a dive off the coast of Australia attracted lots of attention from hordes of spider crabs.

title: Pentagon will tighten controls on classified information after Discord leak
description: The Pentagon will tighten controls on classified information after the Discord leak.

title: Accuser says Kevin Spacey grope wasn't a caress: ‘It was like a cobra ... angry’
description: A man who says Kevin Spacey made crude and racially offensive remarks before grabbing his genitals said he kept the degrading incident boxed up inside for more than a decade

title: A fiery plane crash in a South Carolina resort town killed all 5 people on board
description: Five people are dead after a single-engine plane crashed over the weekend in a South Carolina coastal resort town

title: Former New York Mayor de Blasio and wife announce separation, but not divorce
description: Former New York Mayor Bill de Blasio and his wife, Chirlane McCray, say they are separating but not divorcing after 29 years of a marriage that helped lift de Blasio into the mayor’s job

title: WATCH:  Bear cub climbs down wall with encouragement from mom
description: A black bear cub appeared nervous as it attempted to climb down a wall, but the little one was eventually able to make the leap after some encouragement from its mother.

title: WATCH:  Piglets and puppies become perfect pals
description: These piglets and puppies became adorable best friends while playing around at an Alabama farm.

title: Secret Service test confirms cocaine found at White House, spokesman says
description: A powder had been undergoing lab testing since being discovered Sunday.

title: 7-year-old boy fatally shot in head by stray bullet amid altercation over jet skis
description: A 7-year-old was in a truck with his grandfather when he was shot and killed by a stray bullet amid an altercation between two groups.

title: Bobcat that attacked a camper in Connecticut tests positive for rabies
description: A bobcat that attacked a camper in a hammock at a Connecticut state park has tested positive for rabies

title: Iran tried to seize 2 oil tankers near Strait of Hormuz, US Navy says
description: The U.S. Navy says Iran tried to seize two oil tankers near the strategic Strait of Hormuz, firing shots at one of them

title: The leaders of Italy and Poland say European Union should focus on stopping migration
description: The prime ministers of Italy and Poland say the European Union should put a priority on stopping illegal migration instead of trying to get the 27 member nations to share responsibility for people who arrive without authorization

title: Philadelphia mass shooting leaves investigators searching for answers
description: Investigators are searching for answers as to why someone wearing a ski mask and body armor went on a deadly shooting spree in Philadelphia on Monday night.

title: WATCH:  Statue of Liberty comes to life in New York drone show
description: Drones took the form of the Statue of Liberty at this Fourth of July event in New York.

title: China dismisses criticism of top diplomat's comments pushing for race-based alliance
description: China is dismissing criticism of racially tinged comments by its top diplomat

title: El Paso Walmart gunman's federal hate crimes sentencing gets underway
description: Patrick Crusius, 24, pleaded guilty to federal charges in the racist shooting at an El Paso Walmart that killed 23 people.

title: 7 people shot in DC, police say
description: Seven people were shot late Tuesday in Washington, D.C., police said.

title: Biden is hosting Swedish prime minister at the White House in a show of support for NATO bid
description: President Joe Biden will be hosting Sweden’s prime minister at the White House on Wednesday in a show of solidarity as the United States presses for the Nordic nation’s entry into NATO

title: Australian rules footballer diagnosed with CTE in landmark finding for female athletes
description: The Australian Sports Brain Bank has diagnosed a former Australian rules football player with chronic traumatic encephalopathy in a landmark finding for female professional athletes

title: ‘Smallville’ actor released from prison for role in sex-trafficking case tied to cult-like group
description: The television actor Allison Mack has been released from a California prison near San Francisco

title: 1 killed, 3 hurt in crash of small plane shortly after takeoff in Southern California
description: Authorities say one person was killed and three others were injured when a single-engine plane crashed on the Fourth of July in Southern California

title: Young man died after fall at a Rocky Mountain waterfall
description: The National Park Service said a 25-year-old Rhode Island man died after falling and being pulled underwater at a waterfall in Colorado’s Rocky Mountain National Park on Sunday

title: WATCH:  Contestants scarf down Key lime pie at Florida eating contest
description: While Joey Chestnut continued his domination of Nathan's Famous Hot Dog Eating Contest in New York, Joshua Mogle swept Florida’s Key Lime Pie Eating Championship in 3 minutes and 35 seconds.
